structure.unit: COUNTIES, CITIES, AND OTHER LOCAL UNITS
A FINANCE AND REVENUE OF CITIES

text.section: Local governments imposing user fees shall establish a special revenue account for each user fee.
All user fees collected and all disbursement of such fees shall be administered according to generally accepted principles of governmental accounting.

law.history: Created 1986 Ky. Acts ch. 181, sec. 3, effective July 15, 1986.
